text: Thæcring phu khea seaafa læa phu khea mar wahˌ nan pen swn hnung cak brrda kheruxnghmay khx ngxallxhˌ dangnan phu dı pra kx bphithi hacy hrux xu m reaa hˌ n bay tu llxhˌ k mimi bap dı «kæ khea thi ca dein wnweiyn pi ma n phukhea thang sxng nan læa phu dı prakxb khwam di doy smakhr cı læw næ nx nxallxhˌ nan khux phuthrng khxbcı læa phuthrng rxbru
